name: Liliana at Work (Spacewalk Control Room), The Offshore Firm (2021)
description:
"Liliana at Work (Spacewalk Control Room)"
The Offshore Firm (2021)
1260 x 900 px, GIF

///// The irony wasn't lost on Liliana, that the person on the outside also had to spend their day cleaning and fixing shit. But she wondered if that person doing the spacewalk out there also had 40% of their salary garnished by a staffing agency. She wondered if the spacewalker also needed a supervisor to sign off on an interplanetary work visa every 6 months. Deep inside Liliana knew the answer to these questions. She knew the difference, but she didn't know why she and her comrades had to be the ones to constantly bear that difference. /////

Metarealistic game photography depicting hypercorporate, antisocial, and sometimes liminal virtual environments.

This photographed scene was created using "The Life Stage: Virtual House," a building design simulator released in 1993 for the 3DO console.

Although the game has fallen into obscurity, it was notably ahead of its time for its use of photographic gameplay elements within an immersive 3D virtual space.

// Artwork by Sabato Visconti // www.sabatobox.com // @sabatobox on IG //
